Text: One Raffles Link (Chinese: 莱佛士连道一号) is an office building located at Marina Centre, Singapore.

Triplets:<One Raffles Link
1:
--------------------
<Text: One Raffles Link:  The building is six storeys high with a basement and is managed by Hongkong Land.>

Text: One Raffles Link:  Built on an elongated slip of land, the building offers the largest columnless floor-plates in the city.

Triplets:<One Raffles Link
6:
--------------------
Text: One Raffles Link:  The development includes CityLink Mall, Singapore's first subterranean mall, which links One Raffles Link with the City Hall MRT Station, Raffles City, Marina Square, Suntec City and the Esplanade.
